variable.name: SAMPLE_ID
variable.description: De-identified Sample ID

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: ANALYTE_TYPE
variable.description: Analyte Type

variable.name: IS_TUMOR
variable.description: Tumor status

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: GENOTYPING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted genotyping

variable.name: LCM_PLATFORM
variable.description: Laser Capture Microdissection manufacturer and system

variable.name: RNA_EXTRACTION_KIT
variable.description: Kit utilized to extract RNA from the mircodissected cells

variable.name: RNA_MEASUREMENT_DEVICE
variable.description: Manufacturer and product name

variable.name: RNA_MEASUREMENT_KIT
variable.description: Kit utilized for the quantitation of RNA

variable.name: TOTAL_RNA_FROM_LCM
variable.description: Total amount of RNA extracted from all microdissected cells

variable.name: RNA_CONCENTRATION
variable.description: RNA concentration following extraction

variable.name: RNA_VOLUME_USED_FOR_RNA-Seq
variable.description: Amount of RNA solution used for sequencing

variable.name: RNA_MASS_USED_FOR_RNA-Seq
variable.description: Amount of RNA used for sequencing

variable.name: RIBOSOMAL_DEPLETION
variable.description: Kit utilized to deplete 5S, 5.8S, 18S and 28S ribosomal RNA from total RNA

variable.name: LIBRARY_PREP
variable.description: Kit used to convert full set of RNA transcripts into a cDNA library

variable.name: SEQUENCING_PLATFORM
variable.description: Manufacturer and technology version

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CHEMISTRY
variable.description: RNA-Seq sequences the transcriptome

variable.name: READ_LENGTH
variable.description: Length of fragment sequenced

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing
